title.rendered: Earn Money as a Betensured Agent/Affiliate

content.rendered:
Betensured is bringing you an amazing offer to earn money as a Betensured agent, by joining our affiliate program. This is a great opportunity to partner with the no. 1 Bet Prediction site in Africa, as seen on Forbes.

At Betensured we provide our customers with accurate betting tips, guaranteeing at least 85% of our predictions. And we display odds from betting sites where they can easily place their bets and cash out.

How does it work?

You get to sell Betensured plans to bettors in order to give them guaranteed profits. Our products range from Basic to Premium plan and many more. Go to Betensured to learn more about our plans.

When you join our program, you fund your own e-wallet, and set the price you want to sell at. You can load any amount that allows you to sell our plans.

In doing so, you can receive commission worth up to 50%! For example, if you load N100,000 Naira you receive N150,000 Naira in your e-wallet to sell at your own price. Therefore, the more you load, the more you earn.

The beauty of this offer is you won’t be doing it on your own, you’ll get all the help you need. Indeed our dedicated team will support you all the way, giving you the resources to make as much money as you want, and achieve your goals.

Our expert sports analysts use a unique method to make very accurate forecasts, in order to give our customers better value for money. And that is why our customers continue to make profits. Therefore, a partnership with us only leads to a win-win situation. Our customers come back to make more profits from their bets, so as an agent, you can continue to earn money non-stop.

In a fast-growing industry we have gained first-movers advantage to become the no. 1 Bet Prediction company in Africa. Our agent/affiliate program is designed by a team of experts with your goals in mind. So don’t miss out on a great opportunity to earn money as a Betensured agent.

Benefits of Becoming a Betensured Agent

  • High commission rates. Earn up to 50% when you load your e-wallet.
  • Earn commission instantly. Immediate payouts- no time wasting.
  • Excellent support. Each agent has a personal manager assigned to them. Our dedicated team is easily reachable via telephone, email, or live chat.

The program has a quick and easy application process, so what are you waiting for? Join now and start earning.

You can go on our Online Affiliate Program to find out more on how to become an agent with Betensured. Don’t sleep on an opportunity to earn money!
